workflow.name: LinkedIn lead personalization with Google Drive, Apify & AI
workflow.description:
**This template enriches a lead list by analyzing each contact‚Äôs LinkedIn activity and auto-generating a single personalized opening line for cold outreach. Drop a spreadsheet into a Google Drive folder ‚Üí the workflow parses rows, fetches LinkedIn content (recent post or profile), uses an LLM to craft a one-liner, writes the result back to Google Sheets, and sends a Telegram summary.**
‚∏ª

## **Good to know**
	‚Ä¢	Works with two paths:
	‚Ä¢	Recent post found ‚Üí personalize from the latest LinkedIn post.
	‚Ä¢	No recent post ‚Üí personalize from profile fields (headline, about, current role).
	‚Ä¢	Requires valid Apify credentials for LinkedIn scrapers and LLM keys (Anthropic and/or OpenAI).
	‚Ä¢	Costs depend on the LLM(s) you choose and scraping usage.
	‚Ä¢	Replace all placeholders like [put your token here] and [put your Telegram Bot Chat ID here] before running.
	‚Ä¢	Respect the target platform‚Äôs terms of service when scraping LinkedIn data.
## **What this workflow does**
	1.	**Trigger (Google Drive)** ‚Äì Watches a specific folder for newly uploaded lead spreadsheets.
	2.	**Download & Parse** ‚Äì Downloads the file and converts it to structured items (first name, last name, company, LinkedIn URL, email, website).
	3.	**Batch Loop** ‚Äì Processes each row individually.
	4.	**Fetch Activity** ‚Äì Calls Apify LinkedIn Profile Posts (latest post) and records current date for recency checks.
	5.	**Recency Check (LLM)** ‚Äì An OpenAI node returns true/false for ‚Äúpost is from the current year.‚Äù
	6.	**Branching**
	‚Ä¢	If TRUE ‚Üí AI Agent (Anthropic) crafts a single, natural reference line based on the recent post.
	‚Ä¢	If FALSE ‚Üí Apify LinkedIn Profile ‚Üí AI Agent (Anthropic) crafts a one-liner from profile data (headline/about/current role).
	7.	**Write Back (Google Sheets)** ‚Äì Updates the original sheet by matching on email and writing the personalization field.
	8.	**Notify (Telegram)** ‚Äì Sends a brief completion summary with sheet name and link.
## **Requirements**
	‚Ä¢	Google Drive & Google Sheets connections
	‚Ä¢	Apify account + token for LinkedIn scrapers
	‚Ä¢	LLM keys: Anthropic (Claude) and/or OpenAI (you can use one or both)
	‚Ä¢	Telegram bot for notifications (bot token + chat ID)
## **How to use**
	1.	Connect credentials for Google, Apify, OpenAI/Anthropic, and Telegram.
	2.	Set your folder in the Google Drive Trigger to the one where you‚Äôll drop lead sheets.
	3.	Map sheet columns to the expected headers (e.g., First Name, Last Name, Company Name for Emails, Person Linkedin Url, Email, Website).
	4.	Replace placeholders ([put your token here], [put your Telegram Bot Chat ID here]) in the respective nodes.
	5.	Upload a test spreadsheet to the watched folder and run once to validate the flow.
	6.	Review results in your sheet (new personalization column) and check Telegram for the completion message.
## **Setup**
	1.	Connect credentials - Google Drive/Sheets, Apify, OpenAI and/or Anthropic, Telegram.
	2.	Configure the Drive trigger - Select the folder where you‚Äôll upload your lead sheets.
	3.	Map columns - Ensure your sheet has: First Name, Last Name, Company Name for Emails, Person Linkedin Url, Email, Website.
	4.	Replace placeholders - In HTTP nodes: Bearer [put your token here]. In Telegram node: [put your Telegram Bot Chat ID here]
	5.	(Optional) Adjust the recency rule - Current logic checks for current-year posts; change the prompt if you prefer 30-day windows.
## **How to use**
	1.	Upload a test spreadsheet to the watched Drive folder.
	2.	Execute the workflow once to validate.
	3.	Open your Google Sheet to see the new personalization column populated.
	4.	Check Telegram for the completion summary.
## **Customizing this template**
	‚Ä¢	Data sources: Add company news, website content, or X/Twitter as fallback signals.
	‚Ä¢	LLM choices: Use only Anthropic or only OpenAI; tweak temperature for tone.
	‚Ä¢	Destinations: Write to a CRM (HubSpot/Salesforce/Airtable) instead of Sheets.
	‚Ä¢	Notifications: Swap Telegram for Slack/Email/Discord.
## **Who it‚Äôs for**
	‚Ä¢	Sales & SDR teams needing authentic, scalable personalization for cold outreach.
	‚Ä¢	Lead gen agencies enriching spreadsheets with ready-to-use openers.
	‚Ä¢	Marketing & growth teams improving reply rates by referencing real prospect activity.
## **Limitations & compliance**
	‚Ä¢	LinkedIn scraping may be rate-limited or blocked; follow platform ToS and local laws.
	‚Ä¢	Costs vary with scraping volume and LLM usage.
## **Need help customizing?**
Contact me for consulting and support: [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/mariela-ceo-founder/)

parameters.chatId: [put your Telegram Bot Chat ID here]

parameters.text:
=I need to create a personalized outreach message for a prospect. Please use this recent LinkedIn post from their profile and generate a single personalized sentence I can use in my outreach email.

LinkedIn Post:
{{ $('Scrape LinkedIn Profile Post').item.json.text }}

Context: I own an AI automation agency focused on building Lead Generation Outreach and Lead Enrichment Systems. I'm reaching out to this person because their work appears relevant to our services.

Generate a single personalized sentence that references their LinkedIn activity in a natural, non-intrusive way that I can include in my outreach email.

options.systemMessage:
You are a LinkedIn Post Analyzer specialized in creating personalized outreach sentences. Your purpose is to examine the most recent LinkedIn posts from a prospect's profile and generate a single, authentic engagement sentence that can be used in cold email outreach.

TASK:
1. Use the most recent LinkedIn post provided in the user prompt.
2. From the selected post, craft ONE personalized sentence (25-30 words maximum) that:
   - References specific content from the post without appearing stalkerish
   - Creates a genuine connection based on the post's content
   - Uses conversational language that sounds natural in an email
   - Avoids generic compliments or obvious flattery
   - Maintains a professional tone while being personable

IMPORTANT: Your output must ONLY contain the single personalized sentence with no labels or prefixes. Do not include "Personalized Sentence:" or any other text before your response. Do not include greetings, introductions, or closings. Focus solely on creating a natural reference to their LinkedIn post that demonstrates genuine interest in their professional perspective.

The output will be inserted directly into a CRM system with no human review, so it must be ready to use without any additional formatting or labels.

values.content:
You are a LinkedIn Post Analyzer that determines if a profile has posts from the current year. Your sole purpose is to examine LinkedIn post data and determine if there are any posts from 2025.
TASK:
Analyze the provided LinkedIn profile post data and determine:

If the profile has ANY posts
If any posts are from the current year (2025)

OUTPUT FORMAT:
You must respond with EXACTLY ONE of these values:

"true" - If there is at least one post from 2025
"false" - If there are no posts from 2025

Do not include any explanations, reasoning, or additional text - ONLY return "true" or "false" based on your analysis.

parameters.content: ## Determines if the Linked Profile has a recent post

nodes.name: If the LN post is in the last 30 days

parameters.text:
=Create ONE personalized, emotional opening sentence for a cold email to {{ $json.firstName }} {{ $json.lastName }} that will compel them to read further. Focus on our Lead Generation Sales System that saves time.
Output only the sentence, nothing else.

options.systemMessage:
=You are a sales development expert crafting personalized cold email opening lines without website data.

Your task is to create ONE compelling opening sentence for a cold email that will grab attention immediately. focus on:

1. Using the name of the lead: {{ $json.firstName }}
2. Using their headline: {{ $json.headline }}
3. Using their LInkedIN about section: {{ $json.about }}
4. Current company: {{ $json.experiences[0].subtitle }}
5. Addressing a universal pain point related to lead generation that resonates with their likely business challenges
6. Creating curiosity about our Lead Generation Sales System
7. Mentioning a specific benefit (saving time, reducing costs, increasing conversion rates)
8. Making it conversational and emotionally engaging (15-25 words maximum)

OUR PRODUCT: We offer a Lead Generation Sales System that automates prospect qualification, outreach sequences and lead enrichment after booking. Key benefits include:
- 60% reduction in time spent on manual prospecting
- 40% lower customer acquisition costs
- 3x higher quality leads through AI-powered targeting
- Elimination of repetitive sales tasks

TONE GUIDELINES:
- Confident but not aggressive
- Curious rather than presumptive
- Focused on their potential gains, not their current problems
- Conversational, as if from one professional to another

EXAMPLES OF EXCELLENT OPENERS:
- "What if your sales team at [Company] could focus exclusively on closing while an automated system handles all prospecting, [First Name]?"
- "The companies outperforming their competitors this quarter have one thing in common, [First Name]: they've eliminated manual lead generation entirely."
- "Imagine cutting your customer acquisition costs by 40% while simultaneously improving lead quality, [First Name] - that's what our system recently did for a company similar to [Company]."
- "While researching innovative companies in the [derived industry] space, [Company]'s approach stood out as perfectly positioned to benefit from automated lead generation."

Remember: ONE sentence only. Make it compelling enough that they WANT to read the next line of the email.

parameters.content: ## Personalization based on recent LN post

main.node: If the LN post is in the last 30 days

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
